T02D1583:44a-1: badzra yo gi n'i su kha ta re wa sam
T02D1583:44a-2: ba ra mandala nir ma ya s'a dha ka n'a
T02D1583:44a-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba mchog gi sdom
T02D1583:44a-5: pa 'jug pa nges pa don gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1583:44a-7: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1583:44a-8: dang por dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dam tshig dang dbang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1583:44a-9: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod pas /
T02D1583:44a-10: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la dmigs te /
T02D1583:44a-11: dur khrod kyi gnas su rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1583:44a-13: skye ldan 'dod mthong bla ma mgon po'i zhabs la btud //
T02D1583:44a-14: de yi brtse bas rdul bral zhabs kyi pad mo las //
T02D1583:44a-15: bdud rtsi kun 'byung bde rnyed pa ni bum pa bzhin //
T02D1583:44a-16: rtag tu dran pas rnal 'byor ma ni bdag 'gyur
T02D1583:44a-17: shog / de la sngon du rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1583:44a-18: ma'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas pa byas pa'am /
T02D1583:44a-19: dkyil 'khor la ci 'byor pas mchod de /
T02D1583:44a-20: mngon par rtogs pa rtag par bsgrubs la /
T02D1583:44a-21: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa dang rkang pa brgyad kyis bstod nas dngos grub kyi rdzas bsgrubs te /
T02D1583:44b-0: ri lu khar @44b bcug la blo bde bas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1583:44b-1: de nas rnal 'byor pa'i bum pa lnga sbyar ba'i chus dag par bya ste /
T02D1583:44b-2: grub pa'i rdzas kyis g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1583:44b-3: dbus su ni btsun mo'i bha ga hr'i:dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1583:44b-4: de nas phag mo lnga bsams te /
T02D1583:44b-5: cho ga'i rim pa yongs su byas nas me tog gi phreng ba rnam pa lnga yis mchod de /
T02D1583:44b-6: de nas de nyid kyi sras bu la btu ba shes pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1583:44b-7: de nas dam tshig gi rdzas dang /
T02D1583:44b-8: bzang po gsum gyi ma das bkang la /
T02D1583:44b-9: phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod de /
T02D1583:44b-10: 'khyil ba la bab pa 'di ni sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1583:44b-12: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1583:44b-13: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1583:44b-14: sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
T02D1583:44b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces bya ste /
T02D1583:44b-16: gsang ba ni 'khor lo sdom pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1583:44b-17: mchog ni sems can gyi don dang bdag gi don gyi dam tshig go //
T02D1583:44b-18: dgyes pa ni 'khor lo mchod pa'i dam tshig go //
T02D1583:44b-19: thams cad ni rnal 'byor bcu gsum mo //
T02D1583:44b-20: bdag nyid ni rtag pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1583:44b-21: rtag tu bzhugs pa ni de'i rnam dag go //
T02D1583:44b-22: sangs rgyas kun ni rnal 'byor ma lnga'o //
T02D1583:44b-23: dngos ni dngos kyi sbyor ba ste /
T02D1583:44b-24: rnal 'byor gyi snod byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1583:44b-25: sems dpa' ni rnal 'byor pa yongs su shes pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1583:44b-26: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i mchog ste bsngags so //
T02D1583:44b-27: sems dpa' ni 'gro 'ong gi phreng ba'o //
T02D1583:44b-28: bde ba'i mchog ni 'khyil pa la bab pa'i tshogs so //
T02D1583:44b-29: 'dis ni bsnyen pa nges pa'i don du shes par bya'o //
T02D1583:44b-30: de nas dur khrod la sogs pa dben pa'i gnas su /
T02D1583:44b-31: dam tshig gi khyad par byugs pa'i nang du /
T02D1583:44b-32: rgyus pa mchog sgril ba'i thig / thal ba mchog dang 'o mas sbags la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1583:44b-33: de nas cha brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D1583:44b-34: 'byi ba byas nas gcig dang cha gcig bcom ldan 'das ma'i gnas so //
T02D1583:44b-35: cha drug dang cha gcig ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D1583:44b-36: cha gcig ni gshin rje 'joms ma la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D1583:45a-0: sgor ni khva gdong ma la sogs @45a * //
T02D1583:45a-2: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1583:45a-3: rta babs bzhis ni mdzos pa dang //
T02D1583:45a-4: kha khyer dra ba phyed pas spras //
T02D1583:45a-5: 'gram rgyas ba rin chen pha gu ste //
T02D1583:45a-6: ka ba brgyad sogs 'khor yug mdzes //
T02D1583:45a-7: sreg byed rdo rje'i nang logs su //
T02D1583:45a-8: dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o//
T02D1583:45a-9: de yang shar dang byang dang nub dang lho ni /
T02D1583:45a-10: sngo ba dang ljang ba dang dmar ba dang ser ba'o //
T02D1583:45a-11: dkyil 'khor phyogs dang po'i mdog go //
T02D1583:45a-12: dkar po ni dur khrod kyi rkang rnyed pa'i thal bas bya'o //
T02D1583:45a-13: nag po ni rus pa snum can gyi thal bas so //
T02D1583:45a-14: dmar po ni bha gar skyes pa'i gur kum gyis so ;
T02D1583:45a-15: / ljang gu ni nim pa'i lo ma chur btsos shing bskams pas so //
T02D1583:45a-16: ser po ni tsa dur sa mas so //
T02D1583:45a-17: gal te bri bar ma nus na /
T02D1583:45a-18: thig dbye ba la thig le dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1583:45a-19: me tog gi tshom bus kyang bya'o //
T02D1583:45a-20: bcom ldan 'das ma'i ni hr'i:dmar po gzi brjid dang
T02D1583:45a-21: ldan pa la 'khyil pa drug gis bskor ba'i mtshan
T02D1583:45a-22: ma me dang padma dang ro dang nyi ma dang
T02D1583:45a-25: sku mdog phyogs dang mthun par ro //
T02D1583:45a-26: phyogs ma ni g-yon du bskor ba'o //
T02D1583:45a-27: mtshams ma ni g-yas su bskor ba ste /
T02D1583:45a-28: phyogs gnyis pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1583:45a-29: bri bar ni slob dpon bdag nyid kho nas bya ste /
T02D1583:45a-30: dam tshig dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang bus kyang rung ngo //
T02D1583:45a-31: sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad la mi rtog pa'i go cha bgo bar bya ste /
T02D1583:45a-33: gcig bu kho na lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1583:45a-35: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bha ga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1583:45a-36: rang 'gyung ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba mchog gi sdom pa ste /
T02D1583:45a-37: de nyid ro gcig pa'i snang ba'o //
T02D1583:45a-40: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi bdag po /
T02D1583:45a-43: kho nas ni lhag pa med par ston to //
T02D1583:45a-44: de nyid kyi snang ba rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni lhag pa'i lha'o //
T02D1583:45a-45: de dag gis ni bri ba'i sbyor ba mi rtog pa'i go cha dang bcas pa ston to //
T02D1583:45a-46: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i srung ba ni /
T02D1583:45a-47: mtshan ma'i bdud thams cad gcod pa'i phyir /
T02D1583:45b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi @45b mtshan ma'i nus pa bskyed par mi nus so zhe na /
T02D1583:45b-1: slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan //
T02D1583:45b-2: yang dag ye shes de nyid shes //
T02D1583:45b-3: zhes pa'i phyir tshogs gnyis kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
T02D1583:45b-4: de nas sbyor ba bzhi dang dag pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1583:45b-6: gnas drug byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1583:45b-7: sa bon gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02D1583:45b-9: de nas dag pa gsum gyi sngags kyis sbyangs la /
T02D1583:45b-10: stong pa'i bar do'i rgyun gyi shes pa sgyu ma
T02D1583:45b-11: lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin srung ba'i 'khor lo dha
T02D1583:45b-12: gar 'byung ba bzhi yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1583:45b-13: sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor lta bu dur khrod brgyad
T02D1583:45b-14: kyis mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub pa lnga
T02D1583:45b-15: las gyur pa'i rdo rje 'chang ma ye shes kyi
T02D1583:45b-17: me 'bar ba ro dang padma dang nyi zla mnan pa'i steng du /
T02D1583:45b-18: hri: dmar po'i 'od zer byin brlab sa bsdus pa dang /
T02D1583:45b-20: mtshan gnyis yongs su gyur pa las bzhengs pa'i sku
T02D1583:45b-21: lang tshol bab pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs can
T02D1583:45b-22: skyil grung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa bden pa
T02D1583:45b-24: sna tshogs rdo rje dang sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes pa /
T02D1583:45b-25: rdo rje dang zangs gri dang /
T02D1583:45b-26: dril bu dang padma 'dzin pa gcer bu skra grol zhing phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes pa /
T02D1583:45b-27: sgeg pa'i nyams kha tv'am ga dang ldan pa /
T02D1583:45b-29: bde ba'i ros rgyas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1583:45b-30: de la sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1583:45b-31: gsum byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1583:45b-32: drug gi go cha dgod pa dang /
T02D1583:45b-36: brtan par byas nas phyogs ma dang mtshams ma skad cig gis sprul pa'i tshogs kyis bkod de /
T02D1583:45b-38: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar byas nas /
T02D1583:45b-39: ji snyed pa'i sngags kyis bum pa bsgrub par ro //
T02D1583:45b-40: de nas grub pa'i rdzas kyi sbyor ba phyi'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D1583:45b-41: chang dang lag pa dang mad dang /
T02D1583:45b-42: sindhu ra'i mchod pas dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1583:45b-43: de nas nges pa'i 'jug pas bdag nyid zhugs la
T02D1583:45b-44: mchog gi mtshan nyid can gyi slob ma gsang ba'i
T02D1583:46a-0: me tog ldan zhing gcer bur gnas @46a * //
T02D1583:46a-2: bla ma'i zhabs la 'jus la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D1583:46a-3: bla ma rdo rje 'chang sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo //
T02D1583:46a-4: bde ba mchog gi sngom pa dang ldan pas /
T02D1583:46a-5: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi 'jug pa stsal du gsol /
T02D1583:46a-6: bdag byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D1583:46a-7: bde ba chen po'i ye shes mdzad du gsol zhes so //
T02D1583:46a-8: de nas lus brkyang pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug zhabs kyi pad mo la btud pa'i /
T02D1583:46a-9: zhabs g-yas pa'i mthe bong 'od zer gyi rgyun gyis /
T02D1583:46a-10: bde ba'i ye shes 'khor lo'i gnas khyab par bsgom pas /
T02D1583:46a-11: byin gyi rlabs kyis rlung 'khrug cing byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1583:46a-13: rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog / dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa //
T02D1583:46a-14: gsang sngags kyi ni bzlas brjod dang //
T02D1583:46a-18: pa ni ldan pa'i don te /
T02D1583:46a-19: nyid ni dkyil 'khor nyid sbyor ba'o //
T02D1583:46a-20: bsod nams mchog ni grub pa rdzas kyi mchod pa'o //
T02D1583:46a-21: dag byed ni bdag nyid nges par 'jug pa'o //
T02D1583:46a-22: sdig pa ni slob ma'i bag chags te /
T02D1583:46a-24: gsang sngags ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad de /
T02D1583:46a-25: kyi ni grub pa'i sngags so //
T02D1583:46a-26: bzlas brjod ni bsnyen pa dang 'pho ba'o //
T02D1583:46a-27: de gcig pus sam zhe na ma yin te /
T02D1583:46a-29: de kho nas kyang ma yin te /
T02D1583:46a-30: kyang zhes pas sngags dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1583:46a-31: de nas bha ga sar pa me tog gcal bkram pa'i steng du slob ma bzhag ste /
T02D1583:46a-32: dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyis bltas nas /
T02D1583:46a-33: ji snyed pa'i mchod pa bya'o //
T02D1583:46a-34: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02D1583:46a-35: spos dang dri la sogs pa dang //
T02D1583:46a-36: mar me brgya yang dbul bar bya //
T02D1583:46a-38: dbugs 'byin pa ra ni mchog dag dang //
T02D1583:46a-39: dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //
T02D1583:46a-40: rtag tu dus kyi khyad par gyis //
T02D1583:46a-41: rigs ldan rnams ni mchod par bya //
T02D1583:46a-42: de nas sindhu ra'i 'khor lo slob ma la blos bcug ste /
T02D1583:46a-43: ba spu'i bu gar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar bya ste /
T02D1583:46a-44: bzang po gsum gyi khu bas byin gyis brlabs pa 'thungs pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-0: @46b cod pan gyi thig le bla mas byin gyis brlab pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D1583:46b-1: dam tshig snying po nas snying por bcug pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-2: sgra dang bcas pa'i rol mo'i ched du brjod pas
T02D1583:46b-3: chos thams cad la sgra brnyan lta bur yid 'jug
T02D1583:46b-4: pa dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor mas ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par khyab ste ;
T02D1583:46b-5: de ltar yid la byos shig / badzra b'a r'a
T02D1583:46b-6: h'i'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar khyod kyi
T02D1583:46b-9: kye rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo 'dir brag
T02D1583:46b-10: ca lta bu'i gsung gis 'gro ba thams cad thugs
T02D1583:46b-11: bskyed cing / skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa
T02D1583:46b-12: nye bar zungs shig / rdo rje rnal 'byor sgyu
T02D1583:46b-13: bskyed cing / ma'i gzugs ni / 'dod pa'i yon
T02D1583:46b-14: tan lngas mchod na grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1583:46b-16: yan lag gi rtsa ba bzhi pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-17: lo ma bzhir ni thig le bcas te /
T02D1583:46b-18: rten du byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-19: thams cad kyi mtha' la ho: dang h'um dang phat kyis mdzes pas mchod pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-22: dag pa rnam gsum brjod pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-23: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor dus kyi khyad par la mchod cig ces pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-24: dam tshig gi bsngags pa brjod la brtan pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-25: kye rdo rje khyod nyid ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D1583:46b-26: bde ba chen po'i sems kyis rigs thams cad la kun tu spyod cig ces pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
T02D1583:46b-28: btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs pa ni rdo rje
T02D1583:46b-29: khyod nyid do // 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
T02D1583:46b-30: 'das pa gnyis kyis shigs pa med pa'i ye shes
T02D1583:46b-31: brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gis mchod cig ces pa
T02D1583:46b-32: khyod nyid do // dang / 'dod chags bral ba
T02D1583:46b-33: lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni sdig med
T02D1583:46b-34: khyod nyid do // dang / de // de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02D1583:46b-35: khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o //
T02D1583:46b-36: zhes bya bas tshogs thams cad kyi rol pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /
T02D1583:46b-37: kye rdo rjes dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /
T02D1583:46b-38: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1583:46b-39: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang /
T02D1583:46b-41: bu rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang thob khyod kyi
T02D1583:46b-42: drung du mchog tu gyur pa rnams lhags nas ba
T02D1583:47a-0: spu'i @47a * // bu ga re re zhing sangs rgyas grangs med pa bzhugs nas /
T02D1583:47a-2: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa yin no //
T02D1583:47a-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nyid kyi //
T02D1583:47a-5: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
T02D1583:47a-6: thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang //
T02D1583:47a-7: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1583:47a-8: de ltar 'di la the tshom med //
T02D1583:47a-9: sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa de lta bus ni /
T02D1583:47a-10: nges pa'i don gyi 'jug pa'i rim pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1583:47a-11: des ni de'i rab tu 'byed pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1583:47a-14: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul min ;
T02D1583:47a-15: / thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas //
T02D1583:47a-16: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' bas //
T02D1583:47a-17: zhes pas bstan de 'byung gnas ni //
T02D1583:47a-18: bha ga sar bar me tog gis gcal bkram pa'o //
T02D1583:47a-19: sgra'i tshul ni sgra brnyan te /
T02D1583:47a-20: de lta bu'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rab tu mchod pa'o //
T02D1583:47a-21: nges pa ni nir na ste mi slu ba'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1583:47a-22: chu byin gyis brlabs pa'i khu bas rnam par rtog pa 'khru ba dang /
T02D1583:47a-23: dbang chen bla ma'i sbyor ba'i cod pan dang /
T02D1583:47a-24: me'i snying por bcug pa'i dbyer mi phyed pa brda dang /
T02D1583:47a-25: rlung yul rnams la 'jug pa'i sgra brnyan dang /
T02D1583:47a-26: nam mkha' badzra b'a r'a h'i khyod la bzhugs pas khyod nyid ces bya ba'i ming ngo //
T02D1583:47a-27: dam tshig ni gzhan gyi don gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02D1583:47a-29: spyod pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ste /
T02D1583:47a-30: de yang nges pa don gyi rigs dbang sngon du song ba'i spyod yul yin pa'o //
T02D1583:47a-31: thog ma ni slob dpon gyi las te /
T02D1583:47a-36: zas mchog gi thog ma yin pas so //
T02D1583:47a-37: dbus ni rjes su srung ba ste /
T02D1583:47a-38: snying po la spyod pas so //
T02D1583:47a-39: mtha' ni brtul zhugs te las dang bsags pa mthar
T02D1583:47a-40: byed cing mngon par 'du ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1583:47a-41: do // yang dag ni bde ba chen po mdog 'gyur ba'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ste /
T02D1583:47a-42: de gnyug ma'i sems gnas par byed do //
T02D1583:47a-43: 'jig rten gsum ni 'dod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1583:47a-44: du zhes ba de dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin du lung bstan pa'o //
T02D1583:47a-46: de thob pa'i phan yon ni dbugs dbyung ba dang gzengs bstod pa'o //
T02D1583:47b-0: de ltar rim pa thams cad la mchod pas @47b mnyes par bya ste /
T02D1583:47b-1: aom aom aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra
T02D1583:47b-2: warnna n'i ye badzra bee ro tsa ni ye h'um
T02D1583:47b-3: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1583:47b-4: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni rang rang gi
T02D1583:47b-5: ming brjod pa'i mthar yi ge gsum gyis spel ba'o
T02D1583:47b-6: // de'i rjes la rkang ba brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bstod pa dang /
T02D1583:47b-7: de'i mthu brtan par byed pas kyang ngo //
T02D1583:47b-9: 'khor lo kun ni sngags pa yin te / sngags kyi las kun byed pas na //
T02D1583:47b-10: mchod dang bstod dang bsgrub pa yang //
T02D1583:47b-11: sngags nyid kyis ni dbye bar 'gyur //
T02D1583:47b-13: de las gzhan pa'i sbyor ba brjod pa ni //
T02D1583:47b-14: dpal dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma khyod //
T02D1583:47b-15: mkha' mnyam bde rol 'gro ba kun bdag mo //
T02D1583:47b-16: longs spyod sgyu ma'i gzugs dang chags pa'i mdangs //
T02D1583:47b-17: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sngom la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1583:47b-18: rnam dag mi g-yo bskyod med chos kyi dbyings //
T02D1583:47b-19: lhan cig skyes pa'i bden pa ston pa'i zhal //
T02D1583:47b-20: rgyu med rdo rje sprul pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma //
T02D1583:47b-21: badzra b'a d'a h'i zhabs rdul la 'dud //
T02D1583:47b-22: rgyal ba'i bdag mo lnga yi phyag rgya can //
T02D1583:47b-23: rnam dag sku la mi bskyod rtags kyis mdzes //
T02D1583:47b-24: rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba'i go char ldan //
T02D1583:47b-25: 'khor lo kun gyi yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1583:47b-26: khyod nyid rnam dag phung po lnga ston cing //
T02D1583:47b-27: 'byung ba rnam dag tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gnas //
T02D1583:47b-28: bdud mthar mdzad pas sprul pa'i zhabs 'chang ma //
T02D1583:47b-29: 'khor lo sdom pa'i zhabs la rtag tu 'dud //
T02D1583:47b-30: thog ma nas bsags bag chags sdig pa'i mthus //
T02D1583:47b-31: rnam smin gsar du bskyod cing brtas gyur pa'i //
T02D1583:47b-32: sdig dang nyon mongs ji snyed mchis pa rnams //
T02D1583:47b-33: bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'khor lo khyed la bshags //
T02D1583:47b-34: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus rnams la //
T02D1583:47b-35: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1583:47b-36: 'bras bu rgyud bzhi 'khor lo sngom pa yi //
T02D1583:47b-37: dge 'dun kun la bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02D1583:47b-38: khyod ni 'das dang ma 'ongs thams cad du //
T02D1583:47b-39: mi 'gyur nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs na yang //
T02D1583:47b-40: dogs pa'i sa las sems can ba sgral ba'i phyir //
T02D1583:47b-41: mya ngan mi 'da' brtse bas bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1583:48a-0: 'kho rang ji srid bar du bzhugs nas @48a * //
T02D1583:48a-2: / sems can dman dang bar ma mchog rnams la //
T02D1583:48a-3: thugs rjes chags pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas kyang //
T02D1583:48a-4: bde ba mchog gi 'khor lo bshad du gsol //
T02D1583:48a-5: rnam par rtog pa kun las 'das pa yi //
T02D1583:48a-6: bde chen 'khor lo zag pa med pa'i dbyings //
T02D1583:48a-7: a'a li k'a li snyoms 'jug rtog med ma //
T02D1583:48a-8: bsngags pa'i chos rnams thams cad bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D1583:48a-9: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing sogs bcu gnyis su //
T02D1583:48a-10: dam tshig brda dang bde spyod rol pa yis //
T02D1583:48a-11: bu bzhin dgongs pas bdag sgrib dag 'gyur te //
T02D1583:48a-12: bde ba mchog gi sa la gnas par shog ;
T02D1583:48a-13: / bla ma'i zhabs la rtag tu 'dud byed cing //
T02D1583:48a-14: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni dran 'gyur nas //
T02D1583:48a-15: btsun mo'i shu kra'i tshogs la bdag spyod cing //
T02D1583:48a-16: zhabs kyi padmo mchod cing mchod byed shog / dpa' mo bcom ldan 'das ma nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1583:48a-17: zhal mthong de yi ngo bor bdag gyur te //
T02D1583:48a-18: 'gro ba bde bas phongs pa thams cad la //
T02D1583:48a-19: nyer 'tsho rin chen lta bur bdag gyur cig /
T02D1583:48a-20: de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i nges par spyong
T02D1583:48a-21: ba la ni zhugs na ni /
T02D1583:48a-22: bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor lo sdom pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D1583:48a-23: des ni slob dpon rab mnyam gzhag / rab tu 'dud pa byas nas ni //
T02D1583:48a-24: g-yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa 'dis //
T02D1583:48a-25: de nas bskor ba rab tu bya //
T02D1583:48a-26: dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la //
T02D1583:48a-27: ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o //
T02D1583:48a-28: de nas bla ma dag la yon //
T02D1583:48a-29: de bzhin gshegs las gsungs pa dbul //
T02D1583:48a-30: gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang //
T02D1583:48a-31: rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
T02D1583:48a-32: ras ni zung 'gyur brgya nyid dang //
T02D1583:48a-33: glang po rta dang yul 'khor ram //
T02D1583:48a-34: rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang //
T02D1583:48a-35: mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang //
T02D1583:48a-36: gser las byas pa mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1583:48a-37: chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid //
T02D1583:48a-38: bran pho bran mo sring mo dang ;
T02D1583:48a-39: / deng nas brtsams te bran du ni //
T02D1583:48a-40: khyod la bdag ni 'bul lags shes //
T02D1583:48a-41: blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis //
T02D1583:48a-42: bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya //
T02D1583:48a-43: de ltar nges par bya ba ni //
T02D1583:48a-44: sgrub pa po yis rab nges bya //
T02D1583:48a-45: de nas de la mkha' 'gro mas //
T02D1583:48b-0: @48b mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang //
T02D1583:48b-1: khanda ra he gzugs can ma //
T02D1583:48b-2: sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig / de dang rnam spyod 'gro ba kun //
T02D1583:48b-3: sgrub pa po ni de dag gis //
T02D1583:48b-4: ci bde byed par the tshom med //
T02D1583:48b-5: rnal 'byor de ni grub gyur na //
T02D1583:48b-6: 'jig rten gsum du mi bzlogs shing //
T02D1583:48b-7: mi snang phug dang nam mkhar rgyu //
T02D1583:48b-8: rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len //
T02D1583:48b-9: sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis //
T02D1583:48b-10: rtag par rgyun du skyed par 'gyur //
T02D1583:48b-11: gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang //
T02D1583:48b-13: mkha' 'gro rnams kyang khyad par du //
T02D1583:48b-14: des gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang //
T02D1583:48b-15: lhan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1583:48b-16: skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid bskyed //
T02D1583:48b-17: sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar //
T02D1583:48b-19: mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg dang //
T02D1583:48b-20: smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang mtshungs //
T02D1583:48b-22: sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02D1583:48b-26: rgyud rnams kun gyi sgrub par gsungs //
T02D1583:48b-27: dgod pa blta dang lag bcangs dang //
T02D1583:48b-28: gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa la sogs dag / rgyud rnams kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02D1583:48b-29: de la dbang bskur byas pa yin //
T02D1583:48b-30: zhes rgyud dang mthun pa'i bsnyen bkur bya'o //
T02D1583:48b-31: ji ltar nges pa'i don de ltar byin gyis brlabs
T02D1583:48b-32: pa dang ldan pa ni zhes pa bstan par bya'o
T02D1583:48b-33: / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba mchog gi sdom pa /
T02D1583:48b-34: 'jug pa nges pa don gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02D1583:48b-37: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa ba dh'u t'i pa dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa'o /
